title: Crypto investment products reach the highest AUM
description: In a surge driven by a record week of inflows for crypto-derived exchange-traded products (ETPs), the combined assets under management (AUM) for crypto investment products have reached levels unseen since the peak of the last bull market in 2021, according to CoinShares. Record inflows propel AUM to $67 billion As per a report by CoinShares’ […]

title: Keyframer by Apple – Revolutionizing Animation Prototyping with Language-Guided Design
description: In a significant development within the design technology sphere, an Apple research team has unveiled Keyframer, a pioneering animation prototyping tool that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to redefine the creative process. Keyframer marks a pivotal moment in animation design, offering users the ability to seamlessly translate static images into dynamic animations through natural language […]

title: Japan advances legislation to enable investment funds to hold crypto assets
description: In a significant development signaling Japan’s evolving stance on cryptocurrencies, Prime Minister Fumio Kishida’s administration has made strides towards allowing venture capital firms and investment funds to hold crypto assets directly.  The move aims to amend Japan’s Industrial Competitiveness Enhancement Act to accommodate digital assets as eligible investments for investment limited partnerships commonly utilized by […]

title: Meme Kombat presale nears $10m with $900k to IEO target
description: The popular Meme Kombat presale is closing out after recently surpassing $9.2 million. With a hard cap of $10 million, market participants face their last opportunity to buy MK at its discounted presale price of $0.279. Once its hard cap…

title: Ethereum Co-Founder Awaits Verkle Trees for Staking Benefits
description:
Vitalik Buterin, the co-founder of Ethereum (ETH), has expressed his anticipation for the arrival of “Verkle trees” on the blockchain network. The integration of the data structure would see a significant improvement in the disk space used by staking nodes. In a post on social media platform X, Buterin said that he is “looking forward” […]

The post Ethereum Co-Founder Awaits Verkle Trees for Staking Benefits appeared first on Coin Edition.
